Articles.Content:
Kraken comes to the hill.

No hill.

Claim a new hill

My hill

Danny comes by,

no hill

Claim a krakenproof hill

My hill, kraken proof

Squad updates the platform.

No hill.

I claim a hill on the Mun.

my hill

I stop caring about the hill. His hill.

SUDDENLY, I steal the hill out from under his feet and ride it to anywheres.

MY hill.

Squad releases a patch.

The Hill becomes The Hole.

I teleport the Hole to Moho

Moho's whole Hole

I fill it with rocket debrie.

Moho's half hole.

I blow up the rocket debris.

my giant hole on Moho

I fill the Mohole with enough dirt to create a hill.

My Mo-hill.

i use a summon [@Starwaster](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/71262-starwaster/) summon near your Mo-hill  

then i use my heal on it's heel ill to make it clear than i m not interested in any sort of hill or king and empress  

that thingies wich is a lot of îles ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif ":huh:") ? ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif ":kiss:")![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-10T04:15:29Z" title="04/10/2017 04:15  AM" data-short="7 yr">April 10, 2017</time> by WinkAllKerb''**

I claim a hill on Gilly.

my hill that takes up half of Gilly

You realize that your navball was installed in wrong direction.

What you think is a hill is the bottom of the real hill - another half of Gilly.

Also it ha s a name: Gillenhill.

from this you figure this out, the queen of england wrote harry potter saga each day before going to sleep and dropped the copyright to a almost homeless person  

this homeless person hill not far from ric hill

**Edited <time datetime="2017-04-10T16:44:19Z" title="04/10/2017 04:44  PM" data-short="7 yr">April 10, 2017</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
  
badum tssshhh

Unfortunately, business happens. I am able to buy the hill, apologies to all homeless persons.

My hill.

Your companies becomes bankrupt, so I acquire hill and your company.

My hill.

You have acquired his company debts, too.

Creditors' company, hill and their new owner.

I just let all of you continue killing each other over the hill, and excavate my own hill.

My homemade hill.

Reeling from the loss of my company, I kick you off your hill and sit down.

My hill.

The conscience comes to you and wins.

Conscience hill.

Hill is buried in cats. Now its a cat hill.

My cat hill

I don't want any animals on my hill, so I erect some barbed-wire fencing around it. Enclosure for the win!

My hill.

Millions of pigeons descend upon you. Some poop on the barbed wire.

Pigeons' hill.

Spoiler

I then arm the pigeons with every kind of weaponry imaginable, from machine guns to turbolaser turrets to nukes.

Spoiler

As well as instructions on how to use them.

Spoiler

As well as arguments regarding apostrophes.
